original_text: And he brought him all these, cut them in half, and laid each half over against the other. But he did not cut the birds in half.
korean_text: 아브람이 그 모든 것을 가져다가 그 중간을 쪼개고 그 쪼갠 것을 마주 대하여 놓고 그 새는 쪼개지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: And he brought him all these
laid each half over against the other
But he did not cut the birds in half
